item.title: How to find virtual memory area using dgb and memfind tool
item.description: Gdb is awesome tool to learn about programming and hacking. If “awesome” means complicated sometimes, a programmer should mean “decomplicater” every time. To decomplicate the task “Where the hell that address point to?” - there is a simple memfind tool from https://github.com/thetilliwilli/hacktools. download the tool ┌──(tilli㉿pasakoh)-[~/cpython/build3.9] └─$ wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thetilliwilli/hacktools/main/memfind.py ┌──(tilli㉿pasakoh)-[~/cpython/build3.9] └─$ chmod u+x memfind.py One shot usage ┌──(tilli㉿pasakoh)-[~/cpython/build3.9] └─$ ./memfind.py 16238 0x55555596f000 55555596f000-555555991000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0 [heap] Hack the python (REPL usage) Let’s hack python (executable built with debug symbols.
